{% extends "admin/change_list.html" %} {% comment %}This is a dummy fix for the mptt template trying to load the deprecated adminmedia tag, invalid for django >= 1.5 Since djangocms 2.4.3 is blocked on mptt 0.5.2 only, we can't use mptt 0.5.5 that contain this fix. So we are doing it here as an override..{% endcomment %} {% load admin_list i18n mptt_admin %} {% block result_list %} {% if action_form and actions_on_top and cl.full_result_count %}{% admin_actions %}{% endif %} {% mptt_result_list cl %} {% if action_form and actions_on_bottom and cl.full_result_count %}{% admin_actions %}{% endif %} {% endblock %}
